item.title: mapplestory's Tech Collection
item.description:
冒险岛模拟器技术调研及收藏

0.resource list

All Release Messages: https://forum.ragezone.com/f690/

All PS Wiki: http://privateserver.wikia.com/

Server Tech Froum: http://dev.chiasoft.net/

1.Server

1.0 OdinMS

Dev by Java for v0.55 - more stable

http://sourceforge.net/projects/odinms/ https://code.google.com/p/odindoclet/ https://code.google.com/p/dev-odinms/ https://code.google.com/p/projectodin/

1.1 TitanMS

1.2 Vana (A TitanMS Fork)

dev by c++

http://privateserver.wikia.com/wiki/Vana

https://github.com/VanaDev/Vana

https://github.com/retep998/Vana

https://github.com/VanaDev/Vana/wiki

1.3 TinyMapleServer

Dev by golang

适用于不启动服务端，做快捷的客户端开发测试

a tiny maple server so you don’t need to boot up a sluggish server to test a maple client.

http://www.mediafire.com/download/6hsxxssbwqxp674/TinyMapleServer+2.zip

1.4 MapleScala

Dev by Scala

MapleScala is a MapleStory emulator written in Scala langauge. Packages in use

  • MySQL
  • Scalikejdbc
  • Akka IO
  • pbkdf2-scala

Developers

  • Yaminike

1.5 kagami

Dev by Golang

https://github.com/Francesco149/kagami

2.Client

iMapple

The 3rd Maplestory Custom Client EVER MADE. Made by David and Seth ;) https://code.google.com/p/imaple

NoLifeStory

dev by c++

https://forum.ragezone.com/f690/nolifestory-935511/

source: https://github.com/NoLifeDev/NoLifeStory

binary: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/NoLifeStory.7z

Leak: - not support 64bit only for x86 - not support big file

3.Etc.

3.0 NxFormat

http://nxformat.github.io/

客户端资源包及相关工具

3.1 MapleShark 2.0.2.5

MS客户端封包截取分析器

https://github.com/diamondo25/MapleShark

3.2 CMS integrated

https://code.google.com/p/leaf-cms/ Leaf, LeafCMS or Maple Leaf is a CMS for MapleStory private servers. It is going to have integrated support for TitanMS, OdinMS and Vana but currently it is going to be developed to be tested with OdinMS.
